description: This is a C source file implementing a smart card entity for PKI operations including key generation, signing, decryption, and key management. It contains function definitions for managing a smart card's cryptographic activities as part of a PKI system.

methods.name: PKI_KEY_TYPE SmartCardGetKeyType(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the key type (RSA or DSA) of the smart card entity.

methods.name: LONG SmartCardGetKeyLength(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the key length of the smart card entity.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SmartCardGetPublicKey(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PPKI_KEY_TYPE pKeyType,ANSC_HANDLE pKeyParam)
methods.description: Retrieves the public key and key type from the smart card entity.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SmartCardSignData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pDataWillBeSigned,ULONG lengthOfData,SIGNATURE_TYPE SignatureType,PUCHAR pDataSigned,PULONG pLength)
methods.description: Signs data using the private key stored in the smart card, supporting RSA and DSA.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SmartCardDecryptData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pDataWillBeDecrypted,ULONG lengthOfData,PUCHAR pDataDecrypted,PULONG pLength)
methods.description: Decrypts data with the private key (RSA only) stored in the smart card.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SmartCardRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes and frees the smart card entity and its associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscPKICreateSampleSmartCardEntity(PKI_KEY_TYPE type,ULONG length)
methods.description: Factory function to create a new smart card entity object with specified key type and length.

ctags.name: SmartCardSignData
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pDataWillBeSigned,ULONG lengthOfData,SIGNATURE_TYPE SignatureType,PUCHAR pDataSigned,PULONG pLength)
